Malik bahi , Mere Izhaar ka mathlab argiz Tamheed bandna nahi tha, aur na hee mein yeh jurhat karsakta hoon k aap k shaan mein gustakhi ka soch sako , aap ne apnay Uploads k zarea mujhe woh anmol Khazaana diya hain jis ka mein kabhi khwaboon mein socha kiya kartha tha , Haan yeh sach hain k jab meiny Vijay ko aap k page mein dekha tu dil mein pehla khayal yahi aayea k malikjee k taraf se iss film ki upload ki umeed nahi thi, aur jab aap k comments dekhian tu socha kuch izahaar karo , Khushi iss baat ki hain k aap k taraf se mere inzaahr mein jawab aya hain , jaha tak baat meri darkhwast ki hoi filmoon ki hain, ziyda tar kisi na kisi taraf se upload hochuki hain , aur aap ki pages aur messges re check kar k zaroor pir se darkhwast karonga .
Aap k jawab ka bohat bohat shukriya aur umeed raktha hoon k aap k taraf se mazeed khubsoort aur anoml khazany filmoon k shakal mein upload karny ko milengain , akhir mein aap ko Deepwali ki Bohat bohat Mubarakbaad
